description_expanded: KitchenAid Artisan Series 5-Qt Stand Mixer (Pear) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for kitchen & dining. A legendary 5-quart stand mixer with a planetary mixing action and a tilt-head design. Includes a flat beater, dough hook, and wire whip. The pear color is a beautiful finish. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
